situation.title: Services
situation.meta_description: Providing service trades is not allowed at this time.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Providing service trades is not allowed at this time.

Only certain services are allowed to operate, specifically: car repair and servicing, towing services, courier services, electronics and home appliance repair and service, locksmiths, financial advisors, and building and demolishing companies.

Any service trades not mentioned on the list of exceptions are not allowed to operate. This includes barber shops, hairdressers, manicures, pedicures, massages, cosmetic services and others. However, it is possible to have these services ordered home.

If you visit a service trade, make sure to follow the hygienic rules (Hygiene section). Please, wear a mask, keep social distance and disinfect your hands.

The stores can only be entered in groups of 2. The exception being children under 15 accompanied by an adult from the same household (typically parents, grandparents or siblings living with the child).

Try to only use trade services when necessary and leave small repairs for another time. If you enter a shop, follow all hygienic measures, social distance and pay by card. Please, be responsible. You are protecting yourself and others.
